circle.style: fill: url("#gradient-1"); stroke: url("#gradient-0"); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 10.3125px;
circle.title: Main circle

circle.style: fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke: rgb(152, 226, 255); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 10.3125px;
fill: rgb(212, 243, 255); stroke: rgb(99, 211, 255); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 10.3125px;
stroke: rgb(78, 193, 239); fill: rgb(179, 233, 255); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 10.3125px;
stroke: rgb(78, 193, 239); fill: rgb(179, 233, 255); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 10.3125px;
stroke: rgb(78, 193, 239); fill: rgb(179, 233, 255); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 10.3125px;
stroke: rgb(78, 193, 239); fill: rgb(179, 233, 255); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 10.3125px;
fill: rgb(212, 243, 255); stroke: rgb(99, 211, 255); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 10.3125px;

text.style: font-family: "Baloo 2"; font-size: 70.2px; font-weight: 300; line-height: 191.825px; white-space: pre;
